title: Secure Authentication and Multi-Factor Login
summary: Implement secure customer login using multi-factor authentication for safe portal access.
description: Develop a robust authentication system that requires users to log in securely through multi-factor authentication (MFA) methods such as OTP, biometrics, or email verification. The implementation ensures user account protection and compliance with security and regulatory standards.

userStories.title: User Registration and Authentication
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to register and authenticate safely so that I can securely access my online banking portal.

userStories.title: Multi-Factor Authentication Integration
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to verify my login through an additional factor like OTP or biometric so that my account remains secure.

userStories.title: Password Reset via MFA
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to reset my password securely using OTP verification so that I can regain access when needed.

title: Responsive User Interface Design
summary: Design a modern, responsive, and accessible user interface for consistent performance across devices.
description: Create a visually appealing, mobile-friendly, and responsive portal design that adjusts seamlessly across desktops, tablets, and mobile devices while adhering to UX best practices for ease of navigation.

userStories.title: Responsive Design Implementation
userStories.description: As a customer, I want the portal interface to adapt automatically to my device so that I can access it easily from anywhere.

userStories.title: User-Friendly Navigation
userStories.description: As a customer, I want an intuitive navigation experience so that I can quickly locate and access banking services.

title: Personalized Dashboard Experience
summary: Build a customized dashboard that displays relevant account details, products, and services.
description: Develop a personalized dashboard showing account summaries, eligible products, and frequently accessed services based on customer profiles, ensuring a tailored experience.

userStories.title: Display Personalized Banking Information
userStories.description: As a customer, I want my dashboard to display my account balances and product eligibility so that I can manage my finances efficiently.

userStories.title: Quick Access to Common Services
userStories.description: As a customer, I want easy access to frequently used services directly from the dashboard so that my banking experience is faster.

title: Account and Service Request Workflows
summary: Enable customers to open accounts and modify services via guided workflows.
description: Implement simplified and efficient workflows to allow customers to initiate account openings or modify existing services digitally with minimal steps, eliminating the need for branch visits.

userStories.title: Submit Account Opening Requests Online
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to open a bank account online so that I can start banking without visiting a branch.

userStories.title: Submit Service Modification Requests
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to modify my existing banking services through the portal so that I can manage my accounts easily.

userStories.title: Save Partially Completed Applications
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to save my progress on an application so that I can return later to complete it.

title: Real-Time Status Updates and Notifications
summary: Provide real-time tracking and notifications for submitted customer requests.
description: Implement functionality to provide customers with real-time updates and automated email alerts regarding their account openings, service modifications, or document submissions, improving transparency and engagement.

userStories.title: Track Request Status in Real Time
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to monitor my account opening or service request status in real time so that I stay informed.

userStories.title: Receive Email Notifications for Updates
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to receive email updates about my request status so that I am alerted to any progress or actions required.

title: Secure Document Upload and Management
summary: Enable document uploads and secure file storage within the banking portal.
description: Develop a feature that allows customers to upload, manage, and track required documents directly from the portal, utilizing encryption and secure repositories to ensure data protection.

userStories.title: Upload Supporting Documents
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to upload required documents securely within the portal so that my account request can be processed easily.

userStories.title: Validate Uploaded Files
userStories.description: As a system, I want to validate file formats and content so that only correct and safe documents are accepted.

title: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
summary: Implement role-based access permissions to control data visibility and operations.
description: Integrate a role-based access control mechanism to ensure that users—customers, tellers, or administrators—can only view and perform actions within their assigned access levels.

userStories.title: Define User Roles and Permissions
userStories.description: As an administrator, I want to define roles for customers and staff so that each user has the appropriate level of access.

userStories.title: Restrict Access Based on Roles
userStories.description: As a system, I want to restrict access based on the user’s role so that sensitive data is protected.

title: Core Banking System Integration
summary: Integrate self-service portal with the core banking system for seamless data exchange.
description: Develop APIs that facilitate secure data synchronization between the self-service portal and the bank’s existing core banking system. Ensure real-time updates and consistency across all operations while maintaining performance and reliability.

userStories.title: Enable Data Synchronization via APIs
userStories.description: As a system, I want to fetch and update customer and account data from the core banking platform so that information stays consistent.

userStories.title: Handle Integration Failures Gracefully
userStories.description: As a system, I want to handle integration errors with retry mechanisms so that data operations remain uninterrupted.

title: Data Security and Audit Trail Management
summary: Implement high-level data encryption and maintain audit trails of customer activities.
description: Introduce encryption for sensitive data both at rest and in transit, along with comprehensive logging of all customer interactions. Maintain audit trails for transactions, requests, and profile changes to support regulatory compliance and transparency.

userStories.title: Encrypt Customer Data
userStories.description: As a system, I want to encrypt personal and financial data so that all customer information remains secure from breaches.

userStories.title: Maintain Detailed Interaction History
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to view my full activity history so that I can track all actions performed within the portal.
